Package br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model

The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Battle  
    BattlePlatform
    A BattlePlatform object storages all the information regarding a battle: the players' decks, the map and the cards placed on it, the rules being applied etc.
    Card
    Template for the behavior of the cards on the field.
    Deck
    Basically, an serializable array of cards, with some extra functions, an image, a name.
    DefaultRules
    Basic set of rules for any match, including the rules/logic for determining victory or defeat.
    Effect
    A representation of an effect card on the field.
    Field
    This class may represent the player or enemy field.
    Fighter
    A representation of a fighter card on the field.
    Map
    A Map object is a three-dimensional Array containing the cards placed on the field.
    Player  
    Profile
    A class representing the player's data.
    Scene
    A Scene is an object which represents a narrative sequence within the story.
    Shop  
    Trap
    A representation of an trap card on the field.

Package br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model Description

The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself. All of the entities are described here.
